casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2002-0150. Ohio Civ. Rights Comm. v. Countrywide Home Loans, Inc.

Lucas App. No. L-01-1285. On discretionary appeal and motion for admission pro hac vice of J. Englander, F. Snyder, J. Brown, D. Schumacher, and D. Moss by G.J. Conklin. Appeal allowed and motion granted.

Resnick and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., dissent.
